game.title: A Quest to Save the Kingdom
game.objective: Embark on a journey to defeat the evil sorcerer
game.description: You have been chosen by the royal council to retrieve the missing amulet and restore peace.
game.reward: Royal Medal of Honor, 100 gold coins

task.objective: Visit the old library to find clues about the amulet's location
task.description: Search the dusty archives for any mention of the amulet's whereabouts.

task.objective: Confront the Dark Mage in his lair
task.description: Battle your way through hordes of minions to reach the mage's castle.
